mapper.sql: FUNC_ROLE_ID, FUNC_ROLE_CODE, FUNC_ROLE_NAME, FUNC_ROLE_TYPE, FUNC_ROLE_DESC, STATUS, LAST_UPDATOR, LAST_UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select: SELECT SR.FUNC_ROLE_ID, SR.FUNC_ROLE_NAME FROM SET_FUNC_ROLE SR INNER JOIN SET_RGROUP_FROLE SRR ON SR.FUNC_ROLE_ID = SRR.FUNC_ROLE_ID WHERE SRR.RGROUP_ID = #{rgroupId}

SELECT FUNC_ROLE_ID, FUNC_ROLE_NAME FROM SET_FUNC_ROLE WHERE FUNC_ROLE_ID NOT IN ( SELECT SR.FUNC_ROLE_ID FROM SET_FUNC_ROLE SR INNER JOIN SET_RGROUP_FROLE SRR ON SR.FUNC_ROLE_ID = SRR.FUNC_ROLE_ID WHERE SRR.RGROUP_ID = #{rgroupId} )
mapper.insert: insert into SET_FUNC_ROLE (FUNC_ROLE_ID, FUNC_ROLE_CODE, FUNC_ROLE_NAME, FUNC_ROLE_TYPE, FUNC_ROLE_DESC, STATUS, LAST_UPDATOR, LAST_UPDATE_TIME) values (#{funcRoleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funcRoleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funcRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funcRoleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funcRoleDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastUpdator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update SET_FUNC_ROLE
FUNC_ROLE_CODE = #{funcRoleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FUNC_ROLE_NAME = #{funcRoleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FUNC_ROLE_TYPE = #{funcRoleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FUNC_ROLE_DESC = #{funcRoleDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
LAST_UPDATOR = #{lastUpdator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where FUNC_ROLE_ID = #{funcRoleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
